title: Very good, excellent food,
text:
Very good, excellent food, service ambience and price
I would highly recommend it, great unassuming Italian Restaurant

title: Absolutely superb, great food,
text:
Absolutely superb, great food, immaculately clean and very friendly people
Last minute stop but will remember it for next time

title: Ancient Athens
text:
One of the most memorable days of my life
Absolutely breathtaking glimpses of a bygone civilisation
Anyone that visits Athens must visit this amazing place and be aware that it will live up to all your expectations

title: Irish Bar
text:
Well it’s nothing like an Irish bar, a few flags and pictures only
Yes they have Guinness and the burgers are ok but that’s it
Not good enough and cash only
I won’t be back

title: Visiting Show
text:
Visited recently whilst carrying goods for a performance
The venue is fine and modern with adequate load in to rear of stage
Nicely fitted out auditorium
The local crew were helpful on the whole but unfortunately one person most definitely was not nor friendly
I hope I don’t have the need to return

title: St Polten Truckstop
text:
Well - stopped here for some days whilst show in St Polten was on at Festpielhaus.
The truckstop has plenty of parking and WiFi in the parking depending on where you are parked due to routers.
The restaurant and shop are very limited but the staff of 2 ladies or 1 man were friendly and helpful. The toilets and showers were clean and free if you ate in restaurant.
The toilets and shower in the parking area were cleaned regularly
Overall not the best place to be stuck for a few days although there is a village and lake within walking distance

title: Authentic Kebab
text:
Well worth a visit - great Armenian Host with very good English
Visited twice and not disappointed with excellent Kebab wrap and fried potatoes and great price

title: Drink orvEat
text:
Visited after reading review whilst attending show at Onassis Stegi nearby
Great host and staff with good food and all very reasonably priced

title: Cocktail Bar
text:
Quite a trendy, Buzzy bar, plenty of people enjoying drinks and food with music and great service
Sit in or out - good atmosphere

title: Sunday Lunch
text:
Nothing better than having Sunday Lunch at a table near to the log burner or fire at the Swan in Marbury
Excellent roasts, beef with Yorkshire’s, pork with crackling, lamb etc all served with roasties and seasonal vegetables and excellent value
Why not try it - I’m sure you’ll love it and go back again !!!

title: Original Irish Bar
text:
Authentic Irish Pub and Restaurant
Good service and surroundings with occasional live music within walking distance of city centre or Arena

title: Superb - great breakfast
text: Superb - great breakfast in lovely surroundings overlooking the Titanic Quarter served by smiling faces

title: Flight to Tunisia
text:
Fantastic flight with exceptional service from their cabin staff, Nick in charge
Absolutely recommend taking the premium plus flight package.
James Martin Food served with drinks on a 2.45hr flight
Pilot informative and great escape when coming in to land with another plane unexpectedly in front of us !!!

title: Roger & Anne Fogg
text:
We have just returned after 2 fantastic weeks in one of the beach bungalows (1040)
On arrival at the hotel we were taken from the main reception to our beach bungalow - we must say it surpassed our expectations, it was beautiful, very clean and right on the beach
The staff were so friendly and intent on making sure our holiday was memorable for all the right reasons
We were all inclusive and we could have anything we wanted served direct to our patio where the table was laid every day by the wonderful staff
We would like to mention in particular Kamel, Head waiter alongside Moez, Rabii and Hamza - all who couldn’t do enough for us. Also the the 2 girls who cleaned our bungalow and the beach security staff. Many beach activities, parasailing etc by Ramsey and his crew Safety was never a concern with discreet and unobtrusive Police presence.
If we have any slight comment, it would be about the food. It was on the whole very good but lacked consistency and we had to ask often what we would like - they were then more than willing to try to please
Overall we would give it our definite recommendation and suggest to them they book the bungalow for that special service and location - it’s well worth it !
Our thanks to all and we hope to return when possible

title: Sunday Lunch
text:
Myself and family arrived for Sunday Lunch today, showed to our favourite table immediately
Lovely waitress brought drinks straight away whilst we waited for meals which were brought in good time and were delicious. 3 roasts and 1 vegetarian
All were cooked to perfection, hot colourful vegetables cooked as we like them and the roasts pink, hot and tender with tasty gravy. Risotto perfect, hot and moist

All in all a lovely lunch, well priced and in a lovely renovated black and white town centre hotel bar and grill

Would certainly recommend

title: Mexican Caribbean Holiday
text:
We arrived at El Dorado Sensimar Seaside Suites and were immediately aware of the beautiful surroundings, tropical gardens and palms shielding the mainly low rise buildings and the amazing white sandy beach. We had a beach front junior suite with jacuzzi which had towel sculptures on arrival and every day. There were many varied a la carte restaurants, gourmet dining with beach front barbecue and bars. Personal concierge Ula and Emilio were magnificent, as well as Angel (Antonio Banderas) beach barbecue waiter and Mario from Room Service.
We had a fantastic time and would highly recommend
place: El Dorado Seaside Palms by Karisma

title: Pet Shop Boys
text:
We had a superior double room which was lovely, clean and spacious with an excellent bathroom with large shower. Location is very good for the centre of the old town, palazzos and shops.
Staff on the whole were friendly and helpful. My only criticism is if the Manageress who was rude, arrogant and unapologetic for a mistake she made following an email sent by me that was very precise !
I would recommend however the hotel

title: Centre Routiers
text:
Clean motel type room with double bed and shower room, mezzanine floor with single bed.
Bar and restaurant in main building.
Reasonably priced and handy for Centre Routiers and escape from the cab !
Would recommend Drivers if they want a proper bed and showers
place: Kyriad Reims Est Parc Des Expositions

title: Pet Shop Boys
text:
Excellent hotel close to Hamburg Airport, within walking distance.
Modern, clean double room with large bed which was very comfortable. Tv in room and good clean shower room.
Very good bar and restaurant with friendly staff.
Would recommend

title: Birthday Celebration
text:
Well what a surprise.
Organised by my son and daughter in law for my wife's 60th Birthday!
What a great place from the moment we walked in and greeted.
Fabulous restaurant and bar downstairs and all choices of food open to view as we're the fired ovens. Upstairs got even better with a roof terrace bar and restaurant and crowning glory of a music lounge restaurant with live music provided on Sundays by a band of black singers and musicians who were fantastic.
Food was fantastic and reasonably priced - choice was extensive !
Staff were very friendly, amusing and skilled at their respective duties.
Would not hesitate in recommending the Opera Grill, Chester to anyone looking for that extra something and thanks to my son and daughter in law for making it a day to remember for my wife
Anne & Roger Fogg

title: Ristorante L'Abate
text:
Lovely restaurant just off the bustling noisy Piazgo Tasso. Eat outside lovely clean tablecloths, glassware and cutlery. Good was excellent and reasonably priced as was the wine etc served by friendly helpful staff. Would definitely recommend.

Anne & Roger Fogg

title: Agora Apartments Sorrento
text:
Booked this apartment and we were upgraded to a superior room with sofa, seperate bedroom and bathroom - it was a lovely surprise by the extraordinary hosts. It was very comfortable and very clean - the view from the roof terrace was exceptional over Piazza Tasso, bay of Naples and Mount Vesuvius
I would recommend these apartments to anyone and very reasonably priced - little gem in the middle of Sorrento
Our best wishes to our hosts and look forward to our next visit
Anne & Roger Fogg

title: Roger & Anne Fogg
text: Recommended by Promenad Hotel and we found this to be great value, very good food with excellent service

title: Roger & Anne Fogg
text:
Lovely clean double room with sea view. Very kind and friendly owners.
Would not hesitate to recommend this small B & B Hotel to anyone and would definitely stay again if over this way. Handy for Venue Cymru and also town centre whilst being on the sea front ****

title: Eating Out
text: We have visited many times and always found it really good especially since the refurbishment. The food is excellent, well presented and value for money served by friendly staff

title: Ferry Across the Mersey
text:
What a great day out looking around the sights around Albert Dock - bars and restaurants, museums, the Beatles and close to Liverpool 1 and both Cathedrals.
The ferry across the Mersey was a memorable tour for all young or old, family and couples

title: Anniversary
text:
We booked the hot tub cottage suite. We found the cottage overall to be very nice with log fire and new hot tub. However there were some bad points that were rectified when brought to the attention of the hotel staff. The food in the bistro and fig restaurant was absolutely delicious and service impeccable.
The hotel has undergone considerable refurbishment and whilst there were a few remaining things to be done, I enjoyed our time there celebrating our special wedding anniversary.
The spa whilst small was very good and very clean with steam room, pool and numerous treatments.

title: Roger & Anne Fogg
text:
Fantastic 2 week all inclusive stay. Weather and location were fantastic as was the hotel having upgraded to room 405 - beach front bungalow.
The staff were in the main very friendly and helpful mentioning Panos, Blue Bar and Aris, Main Restaurant and occasionally Pool Bar. The food was good, especially having spoken to George and Chef Tasos who both went out of their way to add that special touch. Eleonora in the Activity Team was an absolute joy.
The room 405 was fantastic, right on the beach front and near to both sea and pool. I'm sorry to say that some of the Pool Bar staff did not live up to their colleagues which was a pity.
All in all, a great time and we would definitely stay there again
